name: GLIGHT
description:
LIGHT CREATES, DARKNESS DESTROYS
such is the way of the flickering world of GLIGHT, teetering between reality and illusion.

The peculiar black and white art style emphasizes and gives form to several abilities affecting platform and gameplay mechanics, giving visual representation to your powers to shape and control reality.HOWEVER VAST IS THE DARKNESS...
What you currently see here is just a prototype, and doesn't represent the final game.
Glight was submitted as an entry for the "Epic Mega Jam 2017".
We will develop Glight into a full game and then release it here on STEAM!
